external_games.name: Saviors of Sapphire Wings & Strangers of Sword City Revisited Digital Limited Edition

name: Saviors of Sapphire Wings/Stranger of Sword City Revisited: Limited Edition
storyline: Discover a tale of war, darkness, and the power of bonds, coming to the West for the first time! The world is plunged into ruin after Ol=Ohma, the Overlord of Darkness defeats the Knights of the Round, the last bastion of defense for mankind. 100 years later, a fallen hero returns to life and must lead a new generation of heroes to defeat Ol=Ohma’s forces and restore light and hope to the world. Explore dungeons, use traps and combat prowess to defeat powerful monsters, and bond with your allies to unlock their true potential in this RPG gem.
summary:
A physical limited edition of the game bundle for the Nintendo Switch.

Includes:
- Saviors of Sapphire Wings / Stranger of Sword City Revisited for Nintendo Switch
- "Sapphire Wing Emblem" Enamel Pin
- "Dungeons and Refrains" Official 2-Disc Soundtrack
- "Journey from Savior to Stranger" Art Book
- Collector's Box
